title: The New Leatherman Curl Multi-Tool includes the option for replaceable bits
content:
Leatherman just launched its latest addition to a long, proud line of multi-tools with its new 15-in-1 Curl. It’s 4 inches and 7 ounces of 100% stainless steel utility. And, sure, that’s a lot of power in a compact package, but that’s not where it stops. Leatherman engineered the Curl with what it calls “bit […]

The post The New Leatherman Curl Multi-Tool includes the option for replaceable bits appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jilli Cluff
